alliance.title: Strategic
alliance.description: R&G Espinosa International Adjusters, a prestigious international insurance and reinsurance adjusting firm with a strong presence in the Latin American market. Founded in 2006, with offices in Mexico, Miami (USA), London, Puerto Rico, Colombia, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay, Bolivia, and now Peru.
